name: Sentinel_Ranged.Dark_Blast
display_help: Dark Blast summons the powers of the Netherworld to defeat your foes. The draining effects of most of these powers can reduce your targets' chance to hit.

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Dark_Blast
powers.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 15s on target

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Gloom
powers.display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 8 ticks of 11.62 negative energy damage over 3.6s on target
8 ticks of 16.22 negative energy damage over 3.6s on target
-20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 15s on target

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Umbral_Torrent
powers.display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. This attack deals moderate Negative Energy damage to foes, reduces their chance to hit and sends them flying. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smashing), Foe -To Hit, Knockback

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 30° arc (6 targets max)

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Abyssal_Gaze
powers.display_help: You gaze into your foe's eyes giving them a glimpse into the terrifying netherworld rendering them held, reducing their chance to hit and dealing High Negative Energy damage over the next couple of seconds. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, High DoT(Negative), Foe Hold, -To Hit

display_info: 3 ticks of 37.35 negative energy damage over 2.1s on target
3 ticks of 46.02 negative energy damage over 2.1s on target

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Aim
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long

display_info: 33.30% strength to range for 10s on self
50.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Dark_Obliteration
powers.display_help: You hurl a large blast of negative energy that violently explodes on impact, exposing the dark power of the Netherworld to all foes near the target. Dark Obliteration can reduce the Accuracy of all affected targets. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Antumbral_Beam
powers.display_help: An extremely focused beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Very High, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Life_Drain
powers.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +HP

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Blackstar
powers.display_help: You can unleash a devastating blast of Negative Energy around yourself, dealing massive Negative Energy and Smashing damage and severely reducing affected foes' chance to hit. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
